item.title: Toshiba Strata CIX Does SIP Trunking
item.description:
Business phone systems have transitioned from analog lines to digital T1 and T1 PRI trunks. With the rise of Enterprise VoIP, SIP Trunking has emerged as a popular all-IP option, supported by a growing number of carriers. SIP trunking eliminates the need for on-site PSTN termination by sending voice and data packets to a service provider, leading to cost savings through economies of scale. Toshiba’s Strata CIX IP Business Communication Systems have integrated SIP trunking, removing the need for a separate VoIP gateway...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/toshiba-strata-cix-does-sip-trunking/
